basis: User expresses a concrete plan (15–20 ml water, very light bite, box breathing if overwhelmed, pause if not ready) and notes they’ll slow down and follow step-by-step guidance.
cognitive_dissonance: Mild tension between wanting to progress and concern about suggestions influencing behavior; resolves by committing to slow, incremental steps.
negative_thought_patterns: Tendency to defer action if guidance feels directive; occasional self-doubt about self-regulation and staying within safe pace.
emotional_triggers: Need for safety and predictability; fatigue from heat; anxiety around eating and pressure to follow guidance.
coaching_notes: Keep offering ultra-simple, concrete steps and reassurance. Reinforce autonomy and pacing, provide quick coping tools (box breathing), and acknowledge progress to sustain motivation without pressure.
